name: Ice Jump (VeryTori)
description:
Jump on the ice to get across the lake! There are checkpoints at the larger pieces of ice to save your progress! Enjoy the music and take in the scenery! :D

This game was made for the GDKO Round 1 2023 Game Jam!

Everything in the game was made by me, except for the skybox.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump
